CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The octyloxy chains on spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units can provide PSFDTBT with good solubility in common organic solvents.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| octyloxy chains |
| spirobifluorene |
| PSFDTBT |
| 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| octyloxy chains |
| spirobifluorene |
| PSFDTBT |
| 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units |

These entities are clearly material names mentioned in the paragraph. "units" is a general term and does not provide enough specificity to identify a unique material. Therefore, it was not included in the table.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| good solubility |
| of PSFDTBT |
| in common organic solvents |

The "octyloxy chains on spirobifluorene" and "octyloxy chains on 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units" do not clearly refer to material properties, but rather to the structure of the material. Therefore, they are not included in the table.
